product_name: Pat's Backcountry Beverages Carbonator Bottle Starter Kit
long_description: By day, the Carbonator Bottle Starter Kit from Pat's Backcountry Beverages replaces your everyday 20 oz. water bottle. By night, it carbonates any beverage you put in it for soda on the go.
short_description: By day, the Carbonator Bottle Starter Kit from Pat's Backcountry Beverages replaces your everyday 20 oz. water bottle. By night, it carbonates any beverage you put in it for soda on the go.
